item.title: On-line Certificate Course: EdX HarvardX PH125.1x: Data Science: R Basics
item.description: Verified EdX Certificate of Achievement The course covered an introduction to using R to extract, manipulate and thus analyse data. It basically lays the foundations to using R in data science. Course Notes and code Course exercises are linked with a Datacamp course. Data Science R basics
